official-title.#text:
To direct the Secretary of Labor to conduct a review of
		  the forms related to obtaining workers’ compensation benefits under the Federal
		  Black Lung Benefits Program.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Education and the
			 Workforce

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the
			 following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Burdensome Paperwork Reduction for Our
			 Miners Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Director of the Division of Coal Mine Workers’
			 Compensation
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Division of Coal Mine Workers’ Compensation

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Chief Information Officer of the Department of Labor

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, shall
			 conduct a review of the forms related to obtaining workers’ compensation
			 benefits under the Federal Black Lung Benefits Program to determine whether it
			 is feasible to combine or reduce such forms in order to further the purposes of
			 the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Director of the Office of Management and Budget

text.#text:
Not
			 later than 120 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall implement any feasible combination or reduction of the forms related to
			 obtaining workers’ compensation benefits under the Federal Black Lung Benefits
			 Program identified in the review conducted under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Burdensome Paperwork Reduction for Our Miners Act/s:2/ss:a

text.#text:
Not
			 later than 1 year after the date of the enactment of this Act, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
that describes the
			 findings of the review conducted under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Burdensome Paperwork Reduction for Our Miners Act/s:2/ss:a

text.#text:
Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment
			 of this Act, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
implements any combination or reduction of the forms related to obtaining
			 workers’ compensation benefits under the Federal Black Lung Benefits Program
			 under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Burdensome Paperwork Reduction for Our Miners Act/s:2/ss:b

text.#text: Not later than 1 year after the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 1722 IH: Burdensome Paperwork Reduction for Our Miners Act
